message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share the product. I would like to propose a price of $110 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. I can come down a bit to $120. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering the product's value and our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $115 for the product.
